creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: cream colored carton with tan stripes; wooden box with inscription on inside and outside of lid; wrapped in tissue; gold and pink fabric; black roller; mountain landscape; four lines of text UR corner; small pagoda and square chop LR corner
inscription:
白日照幽居　讀書林下坐　出門時見山　無復人知我
{?}
(Bright sunlight illuminates my hidden dwelling;
I sit, reading books beneath the trees.
Out from the gate, at times I view the mountains:
There are no men here to know of me.)
[Jonathan Chaves]
signed: %%%%昭和己巳秋日寫於 （？吾子 知意）蕭山軒 On an autumn day in the year chi-ssu of Shōwa [1929-30], brushed at the Shō Mountain Pavilion of my (?friend, ?son) ____________.
title: Landscape
